name: Verify the fields under filter edits for Policy

testSteps.description: 1: Verify the fields under filter edits for Policy ({Reports=Inforce Policies})

children.description: Given underwriter is on home page of PAS
And user Navigates to Reports
And select Policy 'Policy' from Reports
And select Reports 'Inforce Policies' from Policy
When user navigates to the filter edits screen

Then below fields should be visible
| Program |
| Market Segment |
| Underwriting Manager |
